title: Call screen work with Google voice
content:
I have a Google Voice phone number, have that setup to where the caller will be prompt Å¥o accounce their name but want to see if the screen call will be still be an option. Any feedback would be awesome.

John (caller announcing their name) -> screen call on pixel 3 XL -> able to pick up the call if i want to.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
